thread.section_title: TRANSFAST Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TRANSFAST | www.transfast.com | 2 of 119
thread.title: Vera Wright

author: Vera Wright
title: Vera Wright
text: I am extremely happy with Transfast, after searching for months to find a easy and convenient way to send money directly to my account I come across Transfast. At first, time and patience is needed to go through the verification process but after that my funds in in my Jamaican account the next business day. I now have my mother and Cousin using Transfast and will recommend it to everyone I know this will benefit. It makes you feel independent as you don't have to bother family and friends to do your banking. love it, love it.
